title: Enchanting Rose Quartz Kundan Stud Earrings - "Gulabi Kundan Bugadalu"
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds). Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Classic Kundan setting with Polki diamonds encircling a soft, blush-toned Rose Quartz cabochon. The earring features intricate floral motifs crafted around the central stone, showcasing a blend of Mughal and South Indian craftsmanship. The setting highlights the natural beauty of the uncut Polki diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday elegance or special occasions. Ideal for small functions like Haldi ceremonies (Pendlikoothuru)
or adding a touch of tradition to a modern outfit.
description: These earrings are a beautiful fusion of traditional Kundan artistry and the gentle allure of Rose Quartz. The Polki diamonds add a touch of timeless elegance, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance. A versatile piece that can be passed down through generations, embodying both style and cultural heritage.
